content: My buddy is selling these - rebrand of a tic-tac like candy. I plan on buying a few as it is but figured it might save on shipping to do a bulk order (cost per single is $5 with $10 for shipping to US) Heâ€™s across the pond but would be willing to bulk ship me all the US ones. For those across the pond, it would be cheaper to order direct still than though.These would be great for Christmas stocking stuffers His listing on plebian markethttps://plebeian.market/listings/TQImages of product:Due to the small amount ($5). Preferred pymt method is Lightning so pm me for an invoice AFTER I place order as I will have the total at that time - estimating $2-$4 per person for shipping vs the $10 shipping charge for just 1 bottle when buying direct.I will leave this open for 3 days  until all sold.If interested in joining the group buy - please post name and qty desired.***UPDATE***I went ahead and bought all his remaining stock (34 total) and got them shipped to me. Â With shipping, net cost to everyone is $7 per bottle.As I have already paid, I do not need pymts to be in LN - so can accept BTC, LN invoice, Strike or PayPal***SECOND UPDATE 12/16/2022***my buddy got 500 more packages and and has sent me an additional 30 - price remains the same $7 eaBTC: bc1qn37ly2yjla0thlnfsverzezrvxtxdsyvecp4esStrike: strike.me/moparminingllcPayPal: MoparMiningLLC@gmail.com paypal account is closedif you wish to pay with LN - just shoot me a dm and I will send you a LN invoice.
